name: Smoke and Mirrors (Aevek)
description:
Created in 1 week using Rust and the Bevy engine by me working alone for the Rusty Jam with the theme "Illusion of Security"

You are a young magician who's practice cards have spilled out everywhere, and some of them have landed in a secure area with angry guards. Luckily you brought your bag of smoke bombs from your favorite vanishing act.  Can your illusion skills help you to get past security?

Can you collect all the cards without being caught?

(I came up with the title early and then ran out of time for the mirror mechanic sorry)
